notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization: A.K.P. and B.P.S.; Data analysis: A.K.P., V.V.L., and L.S.; Resources: B.P.S.; Methodology: A.K.P., V.V.L., and G.S.; GC/MS Analysis: A.K.P. and C.N.S.; Antidiabetic Analysis: H.R.; Software: A.K.P., V.V.L., A.H., and A.-B.F.A.-A.; Supervision: B.P.S.; Validation: C.N.S., A.A.A., and E.F.A.; Visualization: A.K.P. and V.V.L.; Writing—Original draft: A.K.P. and B.P.S.; Writing—Review & Editing: V.V.L., H.R., C.N.S., and E.F.A. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
